meanings.definition: A drinking glass with a stem and base.
meanings.sent1: She sipped water from the shiny goblet.
meanings.sent2: During the feast, he filled his goblet with wine.
meanings.sent3: The princess pretended her goblet held magical potion.
meanings.sent4: The goblet of victory overflowed with joy.
meanings.sent5: The goblet sparkled in the candlelight, tempting all to drink.

meanings.sent1: He carefully gobleted the delicious juice.
meanings.sent2: At the ceremony, they will goblet the sacred wine.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to goblet the milk but spilled it instead.
meanings.sent4: She gobleted the potion of courage before facing the dragon.
meanings.sent5: The knight gobleted the elixir and felt invincible.
